newsitem.title: USA: NYSE seeks to delist CasTech Aluminum.
newsitem.headline: NYSE seeks to delist CasTech Aluminum.

text.p: The New York Stock Exchange said on Friday it will suspend trading in the common stock of CasTech Aluminum Group Inc and it will seek to delist the company's shares.
Fewer than 600,000 shares remain publicly held after Commonwealth Aluminum Corp's tender offer for the company that expired on September 19, 1996, the exchange said.
The exchange said it may suspend a security if it believes that continued dealings in the security are not advisable.
Commonwealth Aluminum said earlier that 12.7 million shares of CasTech were tendered at $20.50 per share.
